name: Garchomp
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Garchomp and this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Manaphy
Attack1Text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Remove from Manaphy the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to that Pokemon.

name: Raichu
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If Raichu evolved from Pikachu during this turn, this attack's base damage is 100 instead of 60.

name: Regigigas
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Rotom's type is Psychic until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium card in your opponent's hand.

name: Buizel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you have Pachirisu in play, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Buizel during your opponent's next turn.

name: Croagunk
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
Attack2Text: If you have Turtwig in play, remove from Croagunk the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Gabite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Gabite by attacks during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, remove 2 damage counters from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Lopunny
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If Lopunny evolved from Buneary during this turn, remove all damage counters from Lopunny.

name: Pachirisu
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If you have Croagunk in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Pichu
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Buneary
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Buneary by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

name: Chimchar
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If you have Piplup in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Gible
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: If Pikachu evolved from Pichu during this turn, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Piplup
Attack1Text: If Piplup has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage plus more 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: If you have Buizel in play, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Turtwig
Attack2Text: If you have Chimchar in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
